column4: Hello, i would like to run this scipt http://pastebin.com/Psd0sfGG at start up, but i don't understand why it doesn't work...i am using sudo update-rc.d -f myscript start 98 2 3 4 5 . stop 80 0 1 6 .  to set it at start up. Ubuntu 11.04
